sentence.Network_en: His atheistic remarks shocked the religious worshippers.

sentence.Network_en: A tragic view of life is thus an uneliminable ingredient in atheistic thought.
sentence.Network_cn: 于是,生命的悲剧意识是无神论思想无法消除的要素.

sentence.Network_en: The leader of the atheistic state, the dialectician of materialism should invoke the Deity.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位无神论国家的领袖, 唯物辩证法大师居然谈起上帝来了.

entry.def: Atheistic means connected with or holding the belief that there is no God.

means.word_mean: 2. related to or characterized by or given to atheism;
